text: The Autism Society of America is a national organization that was founded in 1965. Its original name was National Society for Autistic Children. Their goal is increasing awareness of autism and problems related to it. Since 1970, ASA has held conferences on autism spectrum conditions. Category:1965 establishments in the United States Category:Autism Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States Category:Medical and health organizations in the United States
title: Autism Society of America
